## ChatCoreZendesk.emit() method

Emit an event into the Zendesk chat session. Supported events are: - `typing`<!-- -->: The customer is typing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
emit<T extends keyof EventMap>(eventName: T, data: EventMap[T]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | T | The name of the event to emit. |
|  data | EventMap\[T\] | The data to be sent with the event. |

**Returns:**

void
